Click the `Preview` tab and select a PR template:

- [Bug fix](?expand=1&template=bugfix.md)
- [Documentation fix](?expand=1&template=documentation_fix.md)
- [Performance improvement](?expand=1&template=performance.md)
- [New feature](?expand=1&template=new_feature.md)
- [New documentation tutorial or example](?expand=1&template=new_tutorial.md)
